faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: The most frequently asked questions and answers

items.question: How can I cancel my reservation?
items.answer: To cancel your reservation, you can select the relevant reservation from the "My Reservations" page and click the cancel button. Cancellation conditions vary depending on the hotel and reservation type.

items.question: What are the payment options?
items.answer: We offer credit card (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), bank transfer and payment on arrival options. Payment method may vary by hotel.

items.question: Can I make changes to my reservation?
items.answer: Yes, you can change your reservation details. However, changes are subject to hotel availability and cancellation/modification conditions. We recommend contacting our customer service.

items.question: What is the best price guarantee?
items.answer: If you find the same hotel cheaper on another site for the same dates and conditions, we will refund the difference. Just notify us within 24 hours.

items.question: Are there discounts for children?
items.answer: Most of our hotels offer discounts or free accommodation for children in certain age groups. Details are specified on the hotel page.

items.question: How are hotel ratings calculated?
items.answer: Hotel ratings are calculated based on criteria such as our guests' reviews, cleanliness, location, and service quality. All reviews belong to our verified guests.

items.question: Can I have early check-in or late check-out?
items.answer: Early check-in and late check-out requests are evaluated based on hotel availability. Additional fees may apply. We recommend contacting the hotel directly after booking.

items.question: How do I receive confirmation of my reservation?
items.answer: After making a reservation, a confirmation email will be sent to your email address. You can also view your reservation details in the "My Reservations" section.

howItWorks.title: How Your Room Becomes FREE
howItWorks.description1: Unlike other booking platforms that charge hotels up to 30% commission, Freestays does not charge commission on room bookings.
howItWorks.description2: Instead of keeping margins, we return the full value directly to you ‚Äî and that value equals 100% of your room price when you book with a meal package (Half Board, Full Board or All Inclusive).
howItWorks.description3: Fair, transparent and built to benefit you.

step1.title: Hotels Pay 0%
step1.desc1: Hotels save up to 50% compared to other booking platforms.
step1.desc2: Freestays charges no commission on room accommodation, allowing hotels to keep their revenue and invest in better service and quality.

step2.title: No Commission on Rooms
step2.desc1: Freestays does not earn money on your room.
step2.desc2: Hotels only contribute a small, transparent fee for bringing them guests ‚Äî not a commission on accommodation.

step3.title: We Give It Back to YOU
step3.desc1: Instead of keeping that value, Freestays gives it entirely to you as a discount.
step3.desc2: That discount always equals the room price when you book with a meal package.

step4.title: Room = FREE!
step4.desc1: You only pay for your meals (Half Board, Full Board or All Inclusive).
step4.desc2: The room accommodation is on us.

howItWorks.whyDescription: Unlike traditional booking platforms, we offer a model that works in your favor.

feature1.title: Hotels Win

feature2.title: You Win
